title: Primal Fear (1996) Edward Norton+R.Gere[WIDESCR-Opt.Swesubs]
description:
Optional Swedish subtitles in separate idx/sub files. <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0117381/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0117381/</a>

Amazing acting by Edward Norton (then 26) as the split-personality altar boy who allegedly has butchered his beloved bishop. Norton was deservedly given an Oscar-nomination for this part in one of his first films; years before he made 'American History X' and 'Fight Club'. 

DVDrip, widescreen, XviD 2-pass 704x384, good stereo sound, AC3.
Burn tested, runs well in my DivX player.

My new ripping procedure now gives good quality for a 2 hour film in just 700 MiB.
